## isMoveMovement() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Determine if a move is a tile movement.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isMoveMovement(move: Move): move is TileMovement;
```

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

move is [TileMovement](./hive-lib.tilemovement.md)

true if the move is a tile movement, false otherwise.
